#summary Short video tutorials to teach you how to use various OLED features

= Video Tutorials =

  OLED has is a tool in constant development, which constantly keeps getting new features. To teach you how to use some of them, we developed a series of 3 short tutorials on video.

  # Build your ontologies using ontological design patterns and derivation patterns [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2aHj39hdO0w go to video]
  # Check the quality of your ontology using model simulation and semantic anti-patterns [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KrsvmLOCIjA go to video] 
  # Generate OWL code from your ontology using automatic model-driven transformations [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kTgB0ksJUlg go to video]
